headline: Will Rahul Goyal’s Appointment Signal a Strategic Shift for Molson Coors (TAP)?
summary: Molson Coors Beverage Company recently announced that its Board of Directors has unanimously appointed chief strategy officer Rahul Goyal to succeed Gavin Hattersley as president and CEO, with Goyal set to join the board on October 1, 2025 and Hattersley staying on as advisor through year-end. This executive transition signals a new era for the company, highlighting Goyal's long-standing influence over its portfolio expansion and partnership efforts, including collaborations with The...

content.title: Will Rahul Goyal’s Appointment Signal a Strategic Shift for Molson Coors (TAP)?
content.summary: Molson Coors Beverage Company recently announced that its Board of Directors has unanimously appointed chief strategy officer Rahul Goyal to succeed Gavin Hattersley as president and CEO, with Goyal set to join the board on October 1, 2025 and Hattersley staying on as advisor through year-end. This executive transition signals a new era for the company, highlighting Goyal's long-standing influence over its portfolio expansion and partnership efforts, including collaborations with The...
